column4: nobody is ready for linux, it's like learning morse code, you do it because you want to.
Yes, everyone should know how to receive morse code!
how do you expect to get work done, hanging out in a chat room? The OS doesn't seem to be the issue. ;)
I sad mind on a christmas eve, can only do so much
So much pain, when is there going to be any gain?
your not aware of it yet, but you are gaining. You'll never have to buy new software, no?
That is if all this works
It works, I've been using linux for six years, and I've been Windows FREE, for three years.
I wish i could do that
LjL: as i said, i am re-formatting everything, any advice one i get get a clean machine, to avoid me falling into this mental dilemma and instability?
what's your plan, dual boot, or straight Ubuntu?
straight ubuntu, although i am drifting away from that especially after my present experience ( atpresent this is a ubuntu only machine)
ok, but if you want Winders, install it first.
